author: namapane
body:
#### PR description:
Add DD4Hep version of MF producer from DB. This completes the  migration started with #27886. 
(the default MF producer is unchanged; switch to the DD4Hep version will happen at a later stage.)

Also, add options to test this producer in the regression test.

#### PR validation:
Ran regression test against reference files with all combination of MF producer, era and current.
title: Add DD4Hep version MF producer from DB
